name: Atlas Adventure
description:
Twitch: AlexThomas125

Website: https://sites.google.com/view/atlasadventure/home

A story about a young Shindin (It's a race of Elf) boy who just wants to see his father again, going on boss fights in a huge temple with a magic gem-embedded power-up shield with more gems and powers as you advance in the game, not to mention crafting, enchanting, taming pets, combat, food, and trading. This mostly 3D game is in development and you can follow it through this website.
